title: T206 Piedmont Fact 25 Stovall Moved to BST auction
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: T206 Piedmont Fact 25 Stovall Moved to BST auction
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have a T206 Stovall for sale.  

This is a nice looking card.  I think the reason for the low grade is the pinhole near the top border.



Thanks, Rick
